pageProduct.name: Spatone Iron Supplement 28 Sachets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Spatone 100% Natural Iron Supplement

Spatone is a 100% natural liquid iron supplement that helps in maintaining healthy iron levels. It has been scientifically tested and shown to contain a highly bioavailable source of iron. As Spatone is readily absorbed by the body, you only need to take a small amount of elemental iron which is why Spatone typically causes less of the common side effects of iron supplements such as constipation or stomach irritation.

Suitable for adults, pregnant and post-natal women, children from 2 years of age, vegetarians, vegans and those who are active.

Warnings

Drink plenty of water. Do not exceed 4 sachets daily. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice. Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Iron supplementation may be of assistance where dietary iron intake is inadequate.

Ingredients

Each Spatone sachet contains 25mL Trefriw Wells mineral water equivalent to 5mg elemental iron as ferrous iron (Fe2+). Spatone sachets are filled at the source and are free from any additives or preservatives.

Directions

Adults: Take the contents of 1-2 sachets daily.

Pregnant women: Take the contents of 2 sachets daily.

Children 2-12 years: Take the contents of 1 sachet daily.
